The claim was made in a Facebook post th: 19 regulations have been declared illegal across Canada, making it a crime to impose masking, social distancing, quarantines, mandatory testing, and vaccinating.
Similar claims were found in other posts: indicating a widespread dissemination of the information.
The posts referenced the Republic of Kan: who identified himself as one of the national conveners of the Republic of Kanata. However, the Canadian government stated that the Republic of Kanata is not a legitimate government or lawmaking body.
Health Canada: the government agency responsible for public health, continues to recommend social distancing and the use of masks to slow the spread of COVID-19, contradicting the claim that regulations are illegal.
